metadata.title: AI-Enhanced ML-FAANG Mastery Plan
metadata.description: 20-week comprehensive roadmap for ML researchers transitioning to FAANG software engineering roles with AI-powered learning assistance

week.title: Mock Interview Mastery & Company Deep Dives
objectives: Complete 10+ high-fidelity mock interviews (coding, system design, behavioral)
Achieve a consistent 9/10+ performance score in mock interviews
Deeply research and understand the culture and tech stack of 2 target companies
Master company-specific interview question patterns and leadership principles
Optimize communication and problem-solving strategies under pressure

morning_session.title: Google Interview Prep
activities: Research Google's interview process and key technologies (e.g., Spanner, Borg)
Use AI to identify common Google coding question patterns (Graphs, DP)
Prepare STAR stories aligned with Google's values (e.g., focus on the user)

problems.name: Word Ladder
problems.description: Tests BFS and graph transformation skills.

evening_session.title: Mock Interview: Google Coding
activities: Conduct a full 45-minute mock coding interview with an AI or peer, focusing on a hard graph problem.
Record the session and review for communication clarity and problem-solving process.
Identify 3 areas for improvement.

morning_session.title: Meta (Facebook) Interview Prep
activities: Research Meta's interview process, focusing on product-sense in system design.
Use AI to find common Meta questions (Two Pointers, Heaps, System Design).
Prepare STAR stories aligned with Meta's values (e.g., move fast, be bold).

problems.name: Subarray Sum Equals K
problems.description: Often asked, tests hash map and prefix sum skills.

problems.name: Merge K Sorted Lists
problems.description: Classic heap problem, essential for infra roles.

problems.name: Copy List with Random Pointer
problems.description: Deep copy linked list with random pointers
problems.ai_prompt: How does deep copying relate to model cloning in ML?

problems.name: Find the Duplicate Number
problems.description: Find duplicate using Floyd's cycle detection
problems.ai_prompt: How does duplicate detection relate to data quality in ML pipelines?

problems.name: Reverse Nodes in k-Group
problems.ai_prompt: How does k-group reversal relate to batch processing in ML?

evening_session.title: Mock Interview: Meta System Design
activities: Conduct a 45-minute system design interview (e.g., 'Design News Feed').
Focus on product requirements, API design, and scaling.
Use AI to evaluate your design against best practices.

morning_session.title: Amazon Interview Prep
activities: Deep dive into Amazon's 16 Leadership Principles.
Map each of your STAR stories to 1-2 leadership principles.
Use AI to practice answering behavioral questions using your stories.

problems.name: Top K Frequent Elements
problems.description: Tests heaps/sorting, common in data processing questions.

problems.name: LRU Cache
problems.description: Classic design problem, tests data structure fundamentals.

evening_session.title: Mock Interview: Amazon Behavioral
activities: Conduct a 45-minute behavioral mock interview with an AI or peer.
Practice weaving leadership principles into your answers naturally.
Get feedback on the clarity and impact of your stories.

morning_session.title: Handling Edge Cases & Ambiguity
activities: Practice clarifying ambiguous problem statements with an AI interviewer.
Brainstorm edge cases for common algorithm types (e.g., empty arrays, single nodes).
Develop a mental checklist for testing your solutions.

problems.name: Integer to English Words
problems.description: Lots of edge cases and requires careful coding.

problems.name: Minimum Window Substring
problems.description: Sliding window problem with tricky edge cases.

evening_session.title: Full Loop Mock Interview
activities: Conduct a full 60-minute interview loop (20 min behavioral, 40 min coding).
Focus on smooth transitions and maintaining high energy.
Self-assess your performance on all dimensions.

morning_session.title: Optimizing Under Pressure
activities: Practice coding with a timer to simulate interview pressure.
Develop strategies for getting 'unstuck' during a difficult problem.
Use AI to identify your most common mistakes under pressure.

problems.name: Count of Smaller Numbers After Self

evening_session.title: Week 18 Prep & Mental Recharge
activities: Review performance from all mock interviews this week.
Create a list of 3 key areas to focus on next week.
Disconnect and recharge for the weekend.

saturday.title: Full Mock Interview Loop (Peer/Professional)
saturday.description: Simulate a real on-site loop by doing back-to-back interviews with a peer, mentor, or professional service. The goal is to build stamina and test your performance under realistic conditions. If possible, have different interviewers for each session.
tasks: Session 2: 45-min System Design Interview (e.g., Design a real-time analytics system).
Session 3: 45-min Behavioral Interview focused on leadership and project ownership.
Gather comprehensive feedback from all interviewers and synthesize key themes.
saturday.deliverable: A summary of feedback from the interview loop and a personal action plan for the next week.

sunday.title: Deep Dive & Weakness Remediation
sunday.description: Based on the feedback from the week's mock interviews, spend dedicated time on your weakest area. Whether it's a specific algorithm pattern, system design concept, or behavioral storytelling, this is your chance to turn a weakness into a strength.
tasks: Analyze all mock interview feedback to identify your #1 weak spot.
Watch 2-3 in-depth videos or read articles on that specific topic.
Solve 3-5 LeetCode problems related to that topic, starting from medium and working to hard.
Write a short document explaining the concept in your own words to solidify your understanding.
sunday.deliverable: A write-up explaining your former weak-spot topic, proving your new understanding.

saturday.title: Comprehensive Interview Marathon + AI Performance Optimization

sessions.title: Interview Marathon Day 1
activities: Google technical interview with AI scalability coaching
Meta system design with AI real-time optimization guidance
Amazon behavioral + technical with AI leadership integration
AI comprehensive performance analysis and optimization

sessions.title: Interview Recovery
activities: Interview recovery and optimization with AI strategic guidance

sessions.title: Portfolio Enhancement
activities: AI-assisted optimization of all projects and presentations

sessions.title: Interview Marathon Day 2
activities: Apple design + privacy interview with AI innovation coaching
Netflix personalization system design with AI optimization
Cross-company system integration with AI complexity management
Final AI assessment and readiness validation

sessions.title: Comprehensive Review
activities: AI analysis of all interview performance metrics

sessions.title: Week Planning
activities: Week 17 optimization and Week 18 planning with AI strategic guidance

ai_prompts.text: Conduct intensive Week 17 mock interviews with maximum realism and difficulty. Evaluate my performance across all dimensions and provide detailed optimization strategies.
Help me specialize my interview approach for each target company's specific style, technical focus, and cultural expectations. Provide tailored preparation strategies.
Analyze my interview performance patterns and help me achieve consistent high performance. Focus on eliminating variability and optimizing for peak performance.
